wikipedia_page.main: Billy Porter (July 1905 – 28 April 1946) was an English footballer. His regular position was at full back. He was born in Fleetwood, Lancashire. He played for Windsor Villa, Fleetwood Town, Oldham Athletic, Manchester United and Hyde United, as well as guesting for several teams during the Second World War.

response: *Billy Porter (actor) (born 1969), American actor, Broadway performer, singer
*Billy Porter (criminal) (1850–?), American burglar and underworld figure in New York City
